nodes.text: Galactic Senator Herbin was married to a woman sometime before 22 BBY, during the Clone Wars. In that year, he began cheating on his wife with a holovid actress. The affair was widely publicized over HoloNet News and Entertainment.
Herbin's wife was briefly mentioned in The Clone Wars: No Prisoners, which was released in 2009 and written by Karen Traviss as part of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars multimedia project.
